game.name: Train Simulator: CRH 380A High Speed Train Add-On
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, Steam 도전 과제, Steam 창작마당, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, Steam Cloud, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: The breathtakingly fast CRH380A comes to Train Simulator for authentic and blinding Chinese high-speed action courtesy of Partner Programme developer Just Trains.Following the introduction of passenger-dedicated high-speed railways throughout China in 2007, several iterations of modern-age multiple
